column11: An open orange gift box with a red ribbon and bow on the lid. Inside the orange box, there is a smaller white gift box, also wrapped with a red ribbon. The lid of the orange box is floating slightly above the box, revealing the smaller white box inside. This image depicts a nested gift box, symbolizing a surprise within a surprise, adding an element of intrigue and excitement."
column13: "A sign with the text \"SPECIAL OFFER\" in large, bold letters. Below this, there is smaller text that reads \"SRECIAL OFFER,\" which appears to be a misspelling of \"SPECIAL OFFER.\" Additionally, there is a tag hanging from the sign that states \"$3% OFF TRUE PRICE.\" The interesting aspect of this image is the misspelling of \"SPECIAL\" as \"SRECIAL\" and the unusual discount notation of \"$3% OFF,\" which is not a standard way to represent a discount."
column15: A person in a brown suit holding a fishing rod in one hand and a small box in the other. The fishing rod has a lure attached to it with the text 'SPECIAL OFFER!' written on it. The background features a cityscape with tall buildings. The image is interesting because it combines elements of business attire with a fishing rod, creating an unusual and eye-catching combination."
column17: A stylized, three-dimensional icon or button with a retro design. The icon is rectangular with rounded corners and features an orange and beige color scheme. It has a large circular button on the right side, a smaller rectangular button on the top left, and three horizontal lines in the center, possibly representing sliders or indicators. The design is simple yet visually appealing, with a shadow effect giving it a sense of depth."

column2: Literally erasing a drawing and starting again.
column3: Restarting a project or plan after failure.
column6: Either he was right, considered sorenson, or he was wrong, which meant going back to the drawing board.
column9: A cartoon of an architect or draftsman who has fallen asleep at a drafting table. The table holds a large architectural drawing of a building with domes and arches. Various rolled-up and crumpled papers, a pencil, and a lamp attached to the table are scattered around the floor. A question mark hovers above the person's head, indicating confusion or uncertainty. The scene suggests the person is exhausted from working hard on a complex project."
column11: A collection of measuring and cutting tools arranged on a flat surface. The items include an orange measuring tape, an orange ruler with holes, a pair of dividers, a piece of Velcro, and a grid-like sheet with markings. The grid sheet appears to have numerical markings along the edges, which could be used for precise measurements or crafting purposes. The tools are neatly arranged, suggesting an organized workspace for tasks requiring accuracy and precision. This setup highlights the importance of having the right tools for detailed work, such as drafting, sewing, or other crafts."
column13: A single sheet of white paper with a red and yellow pencil placed diagonally on top of it. The pencil has a sharpened tip and an eraser at the end. The image is minimalist, focusing on the simplicity of everyday objects. The clean, uncluttered composition highlights the basic elements of writing and creativity, evoking a sense of potential and readiness to begin a new task or project."
column15: An open notebook with a brown leather cover and spiral binding. The pages are blank, with some small droplets or splatters near the top of the notebook. The scene focuses on the simplicity and potential of a blank notebook, ready to be filled with ideas, notes, or drawings. The leather cover adds a touch of elegance and durability to the notebook, making it a perfect companion for creative endeavors."
column17: "A single leaf with a unique appearance, featuring two different colored sections: the left side is a darker reddish-brown, while the right side is a lighter orange-brown. The leaf is placed against a plain, light beige background, making the colors stand out prominently. This image highlights the natural beauty and variation in leaf colors, possibly representing the transition of seasons from summer to autumn."
